languages.text: "Отныне ты плетешь кровавую сеть. Отринь мирское, и кровь из рук Его очистит тебя. И будет свершен ритуал отказа от бремени".

traits.locale_text: "Отныне ты тот, кто плетет кровавую сеть. Отринь былое. Отринь мирское... И кровь из рук Его очитсит тебя. И будет свершен Ю'шин".

languages.text: "From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."
languages.original_text: "Отныне ты плетешь кровавую сеть. Отринь мирское, и кровь из рук Его очистит тебя. И будет свершен ритуал отказа от бремени".

traits.locale_text: "From now on, you are weaving the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And Yuh'shin will be done."
"From now on, you are weaving the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And Yuh'shin will be done."
"From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."
"From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."
"From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."
"From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."

languages.text: « Vous tisserez désormais une toile de sang. Renoncez aux possessions matérielles, et laissez l'ichor de Ses mains vous purifier. Ainsi accomplirez-vous le rituel et vous libérerez-vous de votre fardeau. »
languages.original_text: "From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."

traits.locale_text: « Vous tisserez désormais une toile de sang. Renoncez aux possessions matérielles, et laissez l'ichor de Ses mains vous purifier. Ainsi accomplirez-vous le rituel et vous libérerez-vous de votre fardeau. »

languages.text: «De ahora en adelante, tejerá la red de sangre. Evite las cosas mundanas, y la sangre de Sus manos le purificará. Así se realizará el ritual para la liberación de toda carga».
languages.original_text: "From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."

traits.locale_text: «De ahora en adelante, tejerá la red de sangre. Evite las cosas mundanas, y la sangre de Sus manos le purificará. Así se realizará el ritual para la liberación de toda carga».

languages.text: 「これからあなたは血の網を紡ぐのです。俗物に触れてはいけません。さすれば、あのお方の手から流れる血があなたを清めましょう。そして解放の儀式が行われるでしょう」
languages.original_text: "From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."

traits.locale_text: 「これからあなたは血の網を紡ぐのです。俗物に触れてはいけません。さすれば、あのお方の手から流れる血があなたを清めましょう。そして解放の儀式が行われるでしょう」

languages.text: “从此刻起，你要编织鲜血的罗网，远离一切世俗之物。祂手中流出的鲜血会净化你的身心，我们会为你举行血缚得脱仪式。”
languages.original_text: "From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."

traits.locale_text: “从此刻起，你要编织鲜血的罗网，远离一切世俗之物。祂手中流出的鲜血会净化你的身心，我们会为你举行血缚得脱仪式。”

languages.text: "Von nun an spinnt ihr das Netz des Blutes. Schwört weltlichen Dingen ab, dann wird das Blut von seinen Händen Euch läutern. Und es wird das Ritual zur Linderung der Last vollzogen."
languages.original_text: "From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."

traits.locale_text: "Von nun an spinnt ihr das Netz des Blutes. Schwört weltlichen Dingen ab, dann wird das Blut von seinen Händen Euch läutern. Und es wird das Ritual zur Linderung der Last vollzogen."

languages.text: "Bundan böyle kanın ağını öreceksin. Dünyevi şeylerden uzak dur ki O'nun ellerinden akan kan seni arındırsın. Yükten azat ayini başlasın."
languages.original_text: "From now on, you spin the web of blood. Shun worldly things, and the blood from His hands will purify you. And the ritual of releasing the burden will be performed."
